title: Sweet Temptation
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>My, it's already this late. Let's wrap up today's practice soon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay! Eli-san, thank you for accompanying my dance practice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Don't worry about it. You've been steadily taking in things that I've taught you, Ayumu, so it was very worthwhile for me too. Now, let's go change and go home, shall we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ah, umm, Eli-san! Would you like to take a detour after this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>A detour?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>There's a recently opened store specializing in castella nearby. I heard it's really delicious, would you like to go there together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I-, I'd love to go, but.... I don't know, I've been going for some sweets after practice for a while now....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Is that.... a no?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Well, we did move a lot today, so it's okay, right.... yeah, it should be okay! Alright, Ayumu, let's go there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Really!? Then, let's also take this opportunity to try all of the flavorsâ™ª<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
